data.text:
2024 Men's Track Roster

Choose a Player:

Sandy King

Position Sprints

Class Senior

Major Criminology/Criminal Justice

Hometown Chicago, Ill.

Highschool St. Laurence

Bio

Historical

Biography

STATS

2024 - 1st Team All-OVC (4x100 relay - 3rd leg) - Outdoor Track)

2023 - 2nd Team All-OVC (4x100 relay - 3rd leg) - Outdoor Track

2022 - 2nd Team All-OVC (100 meters) - Outdoor Track

2022 - 1st Team All-OVC (4x100 relay - 1st leg) - Outdoor Track

2022 - 2nd Team All-OVC (60 meters) - Indoor Track

2021 - 1st Team All-OVC (4x100 relay - 1st leg) - Outdoor Track

2021 - 2nd Team All-OVC (100 meters) - Outdoor Track

2024: Competed in indoor track during the 2024 season... INDOOR: Competed in six meets during the indoor season... season best 60 meter time was 6.92 at the Eastern Illinois Early Bird... season best 200 meter time was 21.97 at the GVSU Big Meet... season best triple jump mark was 40'11" at the Eastern Illinois Early Bird... OUTDOOR... Competed in six meets during the outdoor season... posted a gold medal time of 40.44 as a member of the 4x100 meter relay team in the OVC Championship earning first team All-OVC... scored points in the 100 and 4x400 meter races at the OVC Championship... season best 100 meter time was 10.44 at the OVC Championship... season best 200 meter time was 21.93 at the Joe Walker Invite... season best 4x100 meter time was 40.31 at the Gary Wieneke Memorial which also enters in sixth in the EIU history book...

2023: Competed in indoor and outdoor track during the 2023 season... INDOOR: Competed in seven meets during the indoor season... member of Ohio Valley Conference Indoor Championship squad scoring points in the 60 meter dash with a sixth place finish... season best 60 meter time was 6.92 at the ISU Gartland Invite... season best 200 meter time was 22.29 at the OVC Championship... OUTDOOR: Competed in seven meets during the outdoor season... scored points in three events at the OVC Outdoor Championships... was a second team All-OVC performer running the third leg on the silver medal 4x100 meter relay team that posted a time of 40.42, time ranked eighth on EIU record book list... was the bronze medalist with a third place finish in the 100 meter dash with a time of 10.40, time ranked seventh on EIU record book list... added a seventh place finish in the 200 meter dash with a season best time of 21.91...

2022: Competed in indoor and outdoor track during the 2022 season... INDOOR: Competed in five meets during the indoor season... earned second team All-Ohio Valley Conference honors with a silver medal finish in the 60 meter dash at the OVC Indoor Championships... OVC Championship 60 meter time was 6.89... season best 60 meter time was 6.86 at the EIU Friday Night which resulted in a first place finish... also ran the 200 meter dash with a season best time of 22.42 at the OVC Championships... OUTDOOR: Competed in five meets during the outdoor season... earned second team All-OVC honors in the 100 meter dash and first team All-OVC honors as part of the gold medal 4x100 relay team... posted a silver medal time of 10.79 at the OVC Championships in the 100 meter dash... relay team had a winning time of 41.07... season best 100 meter time 10.56 at the Huntsman Family Invitational... also ran the 200 meter dash with a season best time of 23.05 at the EIU Big Blue Classic...

2021: Competed in indoor and outdoor track during the 2021 season... INDOOR: Competed in two meets during the indoor season... ran the 60 meter and 200 meter events... season best 60 meter time was 6.93 at the EIU Friday Night... season best 200 meter time was 22.70 at the EIU Friday Night... OUTDOOR: Competed in eight meets during the outdoor season... earned first team All-Ohio Valley Conference honors as a member of the 4x100 relay team running opening leg on gold medal squad that won OVC title with a time of 40.97... earned second team All-OVC honors in the 100 meter with a silver medal time of 10.66... season best 100 meter time was 10.51 at the ISU Redbird Invite... also competed in the 200 meter and triple jump events during year... season best 200 meter time was 21.80 at the EIU / Indiana State Dual... season best triple jump mark was 41'8" at the SIU Bill Cornell... ran opening leg on 4x100 relay team that posted seventh best time in school history of 40.35 at the ISU Pacesetter... member of OVC Outdoor Championship squad scoring points in the 100 meter and 4x100 relay...

HIGH SCHOOL: Competed in track at St. Laurence HS… competed in sprints advancing to the IHSA Class 2A State Championships in the 100 meter dash and as a member of the 4x100 and 4x200 relay teams during junior season… finished sixth at state meet in the 100m with a finals time of 11.04 after running a prelim time of 10.96… won the Clark Sectional with a time of 11.16… also reached state meet in the 100m, 4x100 and 4x200 relay as a sophomore running opening leg on fourth place team in the 4x100 relay team at the IHSA Championships… during summer of senior year was second in the 100m at the Chicago Sprints and Jumps Meet…
